price: En ce jour, quiconque sera épargné, c’est qu’[Allah] lui aura fait miséricorde, Et voilà le succès éclatant.
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
